title: CryptoPrice Tracker
description: This web-based platform lets users track real-time data for over 100 cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin and Ethereum. It features a user-friendly interface with live price updates, market trends, and interactive visuals powered by the CoinGecko API.

title: News App
description: This is a modern React-based News Application built with Vite, designed to fetch and display the latest headlines using the NewsAPI. The app features a clean, responsive interface and categorizes news articles for a better user experience

title: Today Tasks
description: This is a responsive web-based task management application that lets users create, edit, delete, and prioritize tasks with ease. It features real-time updates and a drag-and-drop interface for intuitive task handling. Built with React and Tailwind CSS, it ensures seamless performance across all devices.

title: Coffee Shop
